_header: When Christ went in this world here
_description: Gospel for Wednesday following Fourteenth Sunday after Trinity, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: When crist went in þis werld hereffolk come to him fra sydes sere…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And with grete rewth þam repentAnd tak penance with gude entent
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Uenit ad ihesum leprosus.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia iiii proxima secundum Marcum (rubric, f. 118ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols.
